title: Project Management System
description: Web application for teams to manage projects, tasks, and resources. It is a simple application that allows users to create, edit, and delete projects, tasks, and resources, allocate people to projects and tasks, view the progress and deadlines.
keyFeatures: Create, edit, and delete projects, tasks, and resources
Allocate people to projects and tasks
Simple and easy to use interface
challenges: Laravel is very sophisticated framework for me, so there were not any challenges.
keyLearnings: Basic CRUD operations and role-based access control.
